```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
options(dplyr.summarise.inform = FALSE)
options(scipen = 999)

library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
hh <- read_csv("data/_private/hh_survey/output/output_households.csv")
```

```{r}
veh_summary <- hh %>%
  mutate(
    autos = `Vehicles_Owned/Leased`,
    autos = ifelse(autos > 4, 4, autos)
  ) %>%
  group_by(autos) %>%
  summarize(weight = sum(Weight_Factor, na.rm = TRUE)) %>%
  mutate(
    model = round(weight / sum(weight) * 100, 0),
    survey = c(7, 28, 42, 16, 7)
  )
```
